attributes.action: Allow dogs in cabin to fly back to the UK
attributes.additional_details: Currently we can fly out from the UK with our small dogs in cabin, but coming back to the UK we can't.
attributes.background: Erase that rule and allow flying in with our small pets in the cabin.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Let airlines allow pets in the airplane’s cabin to and from the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602544
